The South of France, renowned for its picturesque landscapes, charming villages, and stunning coastline, is also steeped in history. From ancient Roman ruins to medieval fortresses and Renaissance architecture, this region oﬀers a fascinating glimpse into the past. This guide will take you through the histories of major cities, famous historical sites, and other points of interest to help you plan an enriching and unforgettable trip.
